title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with brocading in chenille yarns
description: Fabric woven by Alexander Morton & Co., inspired by Sardinian peasant embroideries. Large-scale design with central urn of flowers alternating with addorsed horses and peacocks in a circular framing device. In brilliant polychrome chenille yarns on a beige cotton ground.
